item.title: Reproducibility Notes
item.description: The Center for Reproducible Science (CRS) at the University of Zurich publishes a column on Reproducibility in the british-american magazine Significance: January 2020 April 2020 Special on COVID-19

item.title: Communication
item.description: One of the SwissRN Focus Areas is communication: Dissemination of new evidence Propagation of best practices Promotion of a culture change What we offer Publications Whitepapers Guidelines
